place.name: Place de la Concorde
place.description: Major public square in Paris, France.

place.name: Champ de Mars
place.description: Large public greenspace in Paris, located in the seventh arrondissement, between the Eiffel Tower to the northwest and the École Militaire to the southeast.

place.name: Piazza Navona
place.description: Piazza Navona is a public open space in Rome, Italy. It is built on the site of the Stadium of Domitian, built in the 1st century AD.

place.name: Pantheon
place.address: Piazza della Rotonda, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
place.description: Former Roman temple, now a Catholic church, in Rome, Italy, on the site of an earlier temple commissioned by Marcus Agrippa during the reign of Augustus.

place.name: Plaça de Catalunya
place.description: Large square in central Barcelona that is generally considered to be both its city centre and the place where the old city and the 19th century-built Eixample meet.

place.name: Koutoubia
place.address: Medina Jamaa El Fena, 40000 Marrakesh, Morocco
place.description: The largest mosque in Marrakesh, Morocco.
